about_the_game:
STORY

A puss named Jack and his wife Anna travelled the world in search of a safe place where no dogs could reach, but unfortunately dogs gang were everywhere.
When the couple was about to lose all hope, they come to the woods. In the middle of the woods there was an old abandoned hut. Jack and Anna settled in and restored the hut, but suddenly his precious wife Anna fell sick and her condition was severe.
Now, there is only so much time left and winter is coming.

What will Jack do? Can he take care of his wife and also look after his farm and survive the winter?

GAMEPLAY

In Puss in woods you are expected to take care of your farm and grow plenty of crops, and cook delicious food for your beloved one. Things won't be easy, since the dogs are after you and if you don't take care of your wife properly she will meet her end. Try your best and save your wife.

Puss in Woods is mixture of farming , cooking and survival simulation game. In the day you have to take care of your farm and in the night, you cook food and medicine for your wife. Don't die and don't let your wife die!
